title: Ep 236: Back to the Kinks
itunes:title: Ep 236: Back to the Kinks
description:
*Trigger Warning on Rape/Abortion*


On this week’s episode the duo is getting Back to the Kinks!! After catching up with each other the ladies dig into Texas and their new trash abortion laws! (https://www.cnn.com/2021/09/01/politics/texas-abortion-supreme-court-sb8-roe-wade/index.html) After speaking to their own experiences, they discuss how these laws in Texas will truly effect women and the rights to their bodies. The whorederve this week discusses brainstorming fantasies with your partner and how that can bring excitement to the relationship and bedroom. This week, we share 8 simple kinks that can be added to your relationship to add to the fun! (https://www.google.com/amp/s/desir.co.za/blog/couples-sexual-health/8-unusual-sexual-kinks-that-are-fun-to-try-together/amp/) Want to send a hoe mail? Send us your hotmail at Whoreibledecisions@gmail.com


Follow the hosts on social media Weezy @Weezywtf & Mandii @Fullcourtpumps and follow the Whoreible Decisions pages

Instagram @whoreible_decisions

Twitter @whoreiblepod


Don't forget to tag #whoreibledecisions or @ us to let us know what you think of this week's episode!

Want more? Bonus episodes, merch and more Whoreible Decisions!! Become a Patron at Patreon.com/whoreibledecisions
